title: Champions: DAS AGES
body:
Hello everyone! So for anyone who doesn't know, there is a fellow named SwimyFishy who has given his opinion on the champion's alignment using the D&D Alignment Chart. Loved it, joined it, gave my own list. Ya see, what I wish we could get for our beloved champions is some STATS. Facts about their physical attributes, their birthdays, and so on. I know I can't even begin to try to write down their stats. That said, i want to try and give my opinion on what the Ages of these champions are, for who I can guess anyway. Please feel free to join in and give opinions. HONEST opinions please, I've seen some people joking around that Annie was 40.  Also for champions that have existed for over LONG periods of time, I will be filling them in with the term "Ancient" for the time being. Here we go:

{{champion:266}} - Ancient, Immortal
{{champion:103}} - 25, due to Vastaya update
{{champion:84}} - 19
{{champion:12}} - Unknown, since i don't know how Minotaurs age, and how long he has been alive for.
{{champion:32}} - Ancient
{{champion:34}} - Ancient, Immortal
{{champion:1}} - 6
{{champion:22}} - 25
{{champion:136}} - Ancient, Immortal
{{champion:268}} - Ancient, Timeless, Resurrected status
{{champion:432}} - Ancient, Immortal
{{champion:53}} - Less than 10 years, estimated guess
{{champion:63}} - Ancient
{{champion:201}} - 45, or Ancient if Iceborn
{{champion:51}} - 24

{{champion:42}} - Timeless

{{champion:154}} - Less then 10 years, estimated guess
{{champion:238}} - 40
{{champion:115}} - Timeless
{{champion:142}} - 14(physically) Ancient (chronologically)
{{champion:26}} - Ancient, Timeless, Time Displaced
{{champion:143}} - Unknown, possibly Ancient

That is, to the best of my ideas, how old these champs are. Please give your opinions and let me know if I accidentally missed someone.

replies.body:
Neat!

I was going through my spreadsheet, comparing a few ages you've got to the ones I have, and for the most part you and I agree.   (Usually out by a year or two, with a smaller proportion out by a half decade or more).

The biggest differences I think I see are where you call some champs "Ancient" and "Timeless" (like the Ascended), I have ages for them.  They were born human, after all, and they can die (even of old age) - it just takes a very long time indeed.  Nasus and Renekton, for example, are pushing a few millennia these days.  Many of the folks associated with the Shadow Isles were also born human before becoming other than alive.  Karthus in particular was born in Noxus after the creation of the Shadow Isles, and journeyed to there via Bilgewater by choice!

Your Nami is quite a bit older than my Nami, though.

What about Xerath and his aging? I know Ascended can die by aging, eventually. But Xerath doesn't have any organic material to age? Is Xerath an expection or his mind gets weaker with time, due to this he can't hold and control his arcane body together, so he explodes?

I think getting weaker mind wouldn't fit because what we're talking about mind in here is his soul. He has no brain to age and slow his mentality. A soul aging does make sense either to me. What do you think about it? Not wishing for any official answer, just your thoughts.

> [{quoted}](name=Fasmodey,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=ZqtTXn9r,comment-id=00060001,timestamp=2017-08-05T17:09:16.276+0000)
>
> What about Xerath and his aging? I know Ascended can die by aging, eventually. But Xerath doesn't have any organic material to age? Is Xerath an expection or his mind gets weaker with time, due to this he can't hold and control his arcane body together, so he explodes?
> 
> I think getting weaker mind wouldn't fit because what we're talking about mind in here is his soul. He has no brain to age and slow his mentality. A soul aging does make sense either to me. What do you think about it? Not wishing for any official answer, just your thoughts.

My totally-not-official thoughts on the matter is that Xerath is still subject to some 'laws'.  All that magic that he's putting out needs to come from somewhere - and if there were a situation where he weren't able to regain that magic somehow, I think he'd be snuffed out and 'die'.

That's a lot of 'somewhere' and 'somehows', but that's my thought - that as long as he's still got magic to use, he won't die of old age or whatever.  What I think is interesting is that Xerath has actually spent a surprisingly short amount of time in the real world in his present form.  Maybe not long enough to discover all his weaknesses.

But isn't it something correct for all magical creatures? Vastayas require magic to survive, like how humans and most of living beings have such a similar necessity for water. And I'm certain on WAAARGHBobo saying "as every magical creatures need magic to survive, Aurelion Sol is not an expection" at somewhere.

So It is more like not sustaning yourself with water and food (aka starving) than aging.

But as he is a devastating magical reactor, he may need more magic than any others.

You honor me with your pressence sir, even more so just to tell me you have your OWN age spreadsheet. I would love to try and compare notes with you. We could finally make a canonical age list for the champs, and then we could try and make a timeline for the LoL universe. I think the community would love to try celebrating champion birthdays.

To politely correct you, it is "ma'am" not "sir".

But, I'm sure its ok. I bet Bio hardly even cares.

I'm quite surprised by this revelation. I've always imagined Bioluminiscence as the stereotypical middle-aged man that reads his journal on a red chair in front of a fireplace while drinking a glass of bourbon.

Yup. Its not a topic brought up very much, but it is true.

If you want to learn more about her, I made a congratulatory post for her a couple years back. She's always been a lurker on SA&S, and most of the time is quicker to respond to posts than the actual lore team, besides having no interactions with them, and sticking to her super secret projects over in R&D.

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/XyUMu9Kn-can-we-give-a-small-round-of-applause-to-bioluminescence
I see, apologies then for my ignorance
Nami is younger than 21!? How old is she?

https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/1no2gi/we_are_the_jinx_team_ama/cckcym5/


Jinx is definitely older than Vi despite the fact that she's more immature
They both are pretty young still though, Ekko knew Jinx growing up in Zuan!
I'm not gonna trust Ekko's age with all his wibbly wobbly timey wimey stuff

Im pretty sure Vi was an older sister figure to jinx, there are theories that she hates vi for leaving and thats why she started acting like that. Some think vi ekko and jinx were all part of the same gang at one point and ekko liked jinx before she started only causing mayham, and since Vi leaving cause jinx to feel abandoned and become what she has that Ekkp blames Vi. I mean as far as I know these are only theories though but I believe jinx would be 1 to 3 years younger then Vi, maybe even a lil more.

I assume by "immortal" you mean "doesn't age" rather than "can't be killed". Because Ascended are very mortal.

{{champion:69}} is likely older than 24, seeing as she had the resources to fund an expedition into Shurima.

{{champion:114}} is probably younger than 30. He marriage would have likely been arranged when she was less than 20, and she as yet to remove the stain on her honour, so I'd guess about 25.

I don't know what logic you're using for {{champion:90}} . We never see his face, and his voice is distorted. He could be anything.

{{champion:61}} would be about 20-30, but may have been frozen at that age for a few years now.

I like your age for {{champion:2}}. If he doesn't hurry up he'll die of old age soon.

{{champion:27}}  is canonically over a hundred years old.

I think {{champion:98}} is older than {{champion:238}} . And both are closer to forty than thirty. (This is just my opinion, I have no evidence.) {{champion:202}} too.

> I assume by "immortal" you mean "doesn't age" rather than "can't be killed". Because Ascended are very mortal.

In many fantasy universes, immortal term is used as "does not age". For truly "cannot die" entity, eternal is preferred to immortal. At least how it works in Middle-Earth, and Middle-Earth is father of fantasy universes.

Well it's important to make these clarifications.
The mortality status of Middle-Earthen elves is confusing. They are immortal by my definition, in that they can never die, but their bodies can still be broken, and this process is referred to as death. When an elf "dies", like Haldir in the Two Towers, they return to the Hall of Mandos in Valinor. The Silmarillion makes it explicitly clear that this not the afterlife, but rather a physical location in the continent of Aman. Elves can sometimes leave Valinor and return to Middle Earth, Glorfindel being the prime example.
I think the only elf who has ever truly died is Luthien, and she had to ask for special permission from the god of death himself.
Interesting, I did not know that. But It still feels like death to me, even though they don't go to afterlife.

> [{quoted}](name=Epicurus,realm=OCE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=ZqtTXn9r,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-05T05:35:20.891+0000)
>
> I assume by "immortal" you mean "doesn't age" rather than "can't be killed". Because Ascended are very mortal.
> 
> {{champion:69}} is likely older than 24, seeing as she had the resources to fund an expedition into Shurima.
> 
> {{champion:114}} is probably younger than 30. He marriage would have likely been arranged when she was less than 20, and she as yet to remove the stain on her honour, so I'd guess about 25.
> 
> I don't know what logic you're using for {{champion:90}} . We never see his face, and his voice is distorted. He could be anything.
> 
> {{champion:61}} would be about 20-30, but may have been frozen at that age for a few years now.
> 
> I like your age for {{champion:2}}. If he doesn't hurry up he'll die of old age soon.
> 
> {{champion:27}}  is canonically over a hundred years old.
> 
> I think {{champion:98}} is older than {{champion:238}} . And both are closer to forty than thirty. (This is just my opinion, I have no evidence.) {{champion:202}} too.

Wait, Singed is over 100? Where does it say this?

> Singed is a deranged chemist from Zaun who is as brilliant as he is amoral. A child prodigy, he taught himself the ways of chem-tech and biological experimentation, constantly testing the boundaries of conventional science. _**For over a century **_ he has continued to refine his art, having extended the natural span of his life through a mix of volatile chemicals and extensive self-performed surgery. He lets nothing – not morality, and certainly not other people – come between him and the knowledge he seeks.

Singed's bio on the Universe page. I believe it was updated during the Zaun event.
I think Draven and Darius would be closer in age, I can't imagine young Darius caring for a baby at age 9.
Why not, seeing the man he grew up to be I believe he could take care of a baby at 9 years old.
Because that goes against the idea of two brothers growing up on the streets. They fought, not one fought and babysat the other.

If it helps, think of their relationship in the early days like that of the Winchesters. Dean basically raised Sam until he grew old enough to handle himself. It's basically like that, Darius took care of a baby yeah but eventually that baby grew up to be a boy who would help care for both himself and his brother, and vice versa.

Also, Irelia is effectively undead, her soul is bound to her swords now. But because she's a "good guy" she doesn't get any "evil cosmetics" on her it seems. I really hope they put a focus on that when they eventually rework her...
Why do you think the Vastayan are in there 20s again?

Which Vastaya? Because if your talking about the power couple, {{champion:498}} {{champion:497}} , then they are in their 20's because someone asked Riot, and Riot said Xayah was early 20's and Rakan was late 20's

{{champion:201}}  is at least several centuries old, I dunno about ancient though.

{{champion:164}} Is definitely biologically older than 26, somewhere in her 30's probably.

{{champion:420}} Is probably in her early 40's 

It was implied that {{champion:121}} was just a newborn when he entered Runeterra, so he probably isin't any more than a couple centuries old, but he could be as young as a couple years. 

{{champion:96}} is still a baby, but we have no idea how long it would take for him to mature, so like Kha, he could be anywhere from a few years to hundreds of years old.

Yordles are ageless, so they could theoretically live forever until they are killed
From what I could read of {{champion:164}} 's lore, her augmentation began and was finished a year after she was 25. If you have a way to show she reached 30 by then, let me know and I will adjust.
We know for a fact that Jinx is older than Vi, so it's impossible that both Jinx is 20 and Vi is 26.
Then please show me the proof. I feel very strongly where I stand with these two ages. Give me the proof and I will fix
Riot AMA for Jinx's release.
I thought {{champion:136}} had a long life span not immortal D:
I figured a cosmic being that has existed since the beginning of creation would be immortal.

Thanks for your reply :D. 
Aurelion mentions something in his quotes "Celestial dragons live and die by our own beautiful rules."
Yes, but how much of that can you take seriously when he says it as a joke?
It's a movement quote :o
Kayn is 19? What? Hard to believe. Now I can see why everyone called him edgy.
I figured he'd be young, maybe in his 20's. But then I took his personality into account, and also I think he might be younger than Akali. So yeah he's 19.

nice to see something like this in boards but i have my speculations in some champs.

{{champion:84}}  - i think she is not 21 though. i think she is in her late 20's because of his connection to shen and zed, specially they have alot of interractions but subject to change because of her VGU in the future.

{{champion:1}}  - seems 8 tbh.

{{champion:22}} - seems in her late 20's, maybe 28.

{{champion:63}}  - yes brand is an ancient spirit but the body belongs to kegan rodhe that seems in his late 30's dude.

{{champion:51}} - seems 26 tbh.

{{champion:69}}  - Cass looks older than kat tbh. maybe late 20's or early 30's

{{champion:122}}  - ok. this got me mad tbh. i don't think darius is in his late 40's. i think he is in his late 30's or even early 40's to be exact.

{{champion:119}} - mid 30's; 35/36

{{champion:81}} - seems 20/21 to me.

{{champion:245}}  - seems 18 but i think he just looks young because of the time travel stuff.

{{champion:41}} - seems 50 to me tbf.

{{champion:79}} - seems late 40's.

{{champion:104}} - seems early 40's; maybe 40/41/42

{{champion:420}} - seems early 40's cause they have interactions with GP in their younger years

{{champion:59}}  - he is older than garen; maybe 35?

{{champion:222}} - canonically she is older than vi so maybe 23?

{{champion:141}}  - early 20's or even 20 to be exact

{{champion:64}}  - late 30's or early 40's

{{champion:99}}  - seems early 20's; 20 to be exact or 19.

{{champion:21}}  - maybe much late 20's or early 30's; 29/30/31/32

{{champion:20}} - seems 8/9/10; subject to change due to VGU in the future.

{{champion:61}} - once a human like camille so maybe she began to become a full robot in her early 20's

{{champion:92}}  - like MF, she gone through a lot specially through the noxian-ionia invasion

{{champion:98}}  - same with the age of your zed or younger by 1 year; so 37/36

{{champion:134}}  - seems in her late 20's tbf

{{champion:44}}  - close to garens age cause they are bff's maybe early 30's

{{champion:4}} - same with graves but younger

{{champion:110}}  - early 30's or even much late 20's like 29/30 because he is a father now

{{champion:254}}  - seems 22 cause jinx is older than vi

{{champion:8}}  - idk about him. yes he looks like 27 but is he's kinda like immortal; lets wait for his new lore

{{champion:5}}  - early 40's

{{champion:154}}  - in his new lore, he is just a baby i think lol

so that all my opinion on those champs's ages. And those champs that i didn't include is much more the same with your idea.
I think MF is early to mid 30's too. 20's seems too young.

Sorry that the majority of my list doesnt meet ur expectations, even though Bioluminescene of Riot says she has an age spread sheet, and for the most part we both agree with a majority of the ages, XD. But honestly thnx for your opinion, I will look over your list for consideration. Also, concerning {{champion:69}} , she is Kat's younger sister, so she cant be older. I'm also sorry for {{champion:122}} , I made him this old based on a comment from the River King{{champion:223}}"Your strength is waning, General. 'Course, I can help you slow time's regress."
I think, if I remember correctly from his release, {{champion:202}}  is in his late twenties or early thirties, not 44. He was imprisoned in his late teens and spent close to a decade there.

XD you people are killing me. Okay in honesty I originally thought {{champion:202}}  was something like 37. A factor I kept in mind is that Riot said, canonically, he is four years older than Zed. I also know this was also a joke, but it was a fact and joke. I felt {{champion:98}}  was 30 and {{champion:238}}  was three years older than him, so {{champion:202}}  was 37. But then some things about the ages people were sayying started to make more sense, till it eventually got to the point {{champion:202}} was 44. At the moment I'm 80% positive this is his age, if you feel you can persuade me, by all means.

This is really cool! I hope we can get more 15-20 year olds. I automatically like characters closer to my age range more and I need more of them. Don't get me wrong I like Tali, Ekko, and Kayne but for some reason they just aren't doing it for me. Taliyah has the young free spirit, Ekko has the defiant forge your own destiny thing, and Kayne has enough Sasuke-esqe edge to have his own anime, these are all things I like, all well done characters with themes I identify with but I still feel like this age group is underrepresented. To put it in perspective in the 30's-40's age range I count 42 on this list, 19 animal like or animal/human hybrids, 12 Yordles, 6(arguably more, does Jax count?) void champs, and only 3 teens. If you count Urgot and Camille as cyborgs we have 5 cyborgs/robots. League has more robot people than teenagers. 

So, It might be too much to ask because all these young characters are pretty new additions to the lineup, with Kayne being the newest addition, but please Riot could you add some more teenagers?
I remember reading a riot comment saying Swain was only in his 30's or 40's or that that was the general decision the team had come to
Azir lives for only several thousands of years thanks to the ascension**

It's known that Jinx is older than Vi, by the way.

I believe Camille was stated to be over a hundred too, canonically. 

And Nami is a "girl", in the sense of being a non-adult. She's probably around 14, if not younger.

Although I'm not sure non-humans would age as humans would. Whales have a compressed lifespan compared to humans, so a 13 year old human would probably be as mature as 9-10 year old whale. Similarly, a 1 year old bird has the same physical maturity of a 16 year old human. Perhaps Xayah only hatched 2 years ago?

Well the one I know about. Pantheon/Atreus. Panth is some body hoping space parasite so he's timeless. 

Atreus however is somewhere around 18-22. But the Targon lore is pretty bad keeping the ages of the other heroes consistent.
